TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBuildEngine3 implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine2
type IBuildEngine3 = interface interface IBuildEngine2 interface IBuildEngine

summary.span: 此接口将扩展 IBuildEngine，提供一个允许并行生成项目文件的方法。

span.span: This interface extends IBuildEngine to provide a method allowing building project files in parallel.

MemberSignature.Usage: iBuildEngine3.BuildProjectFilesInParallel (projectFileNames, targetNames, globalProperties, removeGlobalProperties, toolsVersion, returnTargetOutputs)

param.name: targetNames
param.span: 要生成的项目中的目标（可以为 null）。

span.span: The targets in the project to build (can be null).

param.name: globalProperties
param.span: 要应用于子项目的其他全局属性的哈希表数组， (数组项可以为 null) 。

span.span: An array of hashtables of additional global properties to apply to the child project (array entries can be null).

param.span: 哈希表中的键和值都应为字符串。

span.span: The key and value in the hashtable should both be strings.

param.name: removeGlobalProperties
param.span: 应移除的全局属性的列表。

span.span: A list of global properties which should be removed.

param.name: toolsVersion
param.span: 引擎所识别的工具版本，将在此生成期间使用（可以为 null）。

span.span: A tools version recognized by the Engine that will be used during this build (can be null).

param.name: returnTargetOutputs
param.span: 是否应在 BuildEngineResult 中返回目标输出

span.span: Should the target outputs be returned in the BuildEngineResult

summary.span: 此方法允许任务启动对特定项目文件的生成。

span.span: This method allows tasks to initiate a build on a particular project file.

summary.span: 如果生成成功，则在返回指定目标的任何) (输出。

span.span: If the build is successful, the outputs (if any) of the specified targets are returned.

returns.span: 返回一个结构，该结构包含生成的成功或失败以及项目的目标输出。

span.span: Returns a structure containing the success or failure of the build and the target outputs by project.

remarks.span: 1) 可接受同时为 targetNames 和 targetOutputs 2) 传递 null，如果未指定任何目标，则生成默认目标

span.span: 1) it is acceptable to pass null for both targetNames and targetOutputs 2) if no targets are specified, the default targets are built

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reacquire() cil managed

summary.span: 等待生成后重新获得控制。

span.span: Waits to reacquire control after yielding.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Yield() cil managed

summary.span: 通知系统，此任务是长时间运行的进程外组件，在完成此工作期间可完成生成中的其他工作。

span.span: Informs the system that this task has a long-running out-of-process component and other work can be done in the build while that work completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 CPU 只有一个节点 ( # A0) 进程。There is only one node (msbuild.exe process) per CPU. 在任何时候，都只能在节点上构建一个项目、目标和任务。Only one project, target, and task can build at any time on a node. 例如，如果某个任务等待生成的工具或其他某个事件完成，则该任务可以调用 Yield，这会立即返回。If a task is waiting, for example, for a spawned tool or some other event to complete, the task can call Yield, which returns immediately. 这允许节点在其他项目中生成目标（如果有）。This lets the node build a target in another project, if any are available. 当任务准备好继续时，应调用 。When the task is ready to continue, it should call . 粗略的规则是，如果任务预计某个操作将需要20或30秒以上，则可以选择在 `Yield` 启动操作之前调用，并在 `Reacquire` 操作完成时进行调用。As a rough rule, if a task expects that an operation will take more than 20 or 30 seconds, it can choose to call `Yield` before it starts the operation, and `Reacquire` when the operation is complete.
